item.title: By: kittyb32
item.dc:creator: kittyb32
item.description: This is a great product, I just got one for my 12 year old and he's been on it all weekend. The handlebars needed to be tightened a lot but theirs a tool in the box to do it. Once that was done, it charged fast and has been fantastic.
item.content:encoded: This is a great product, I just got one for my 12 year old and he’s been on it all weekend. The handlebars needed to be tightened a lot but theirs a tool in the box to do it. Once that was done, it charged fast and has been fantastic.
